name: Diabolik Lovers: Moonfall - Demo
description:
Diabolik Lovers started as a visual novel in 2012. Over the years the frenchise by the company Rejet realised serveral games, drama CD's and two anime sessions. I decided serval years ago to start a Fangame in the style of the Diabolik Lovers anime. That's how Diabolik Lovers Moonfall was born. By now my Fangame has about 20.000 + words and the first chapters are out. I also started redoing the Visual Novel in Renpy. Altho I am still learing the software...

Summary:  The great Vampire King Karl Heinz Sakamaki found a young woman without memory of her past. He claimed that she was a vampire from a nobel family and offered her to stay with him. The young woman changed her name and country to live with the family of Karl Heinz. Many years later her now adoptiv father has a unethical request towards the woman, now named Akiza.

Content Warning: strong language, suggestive themes, drug use, suicide, violence & blood. This game is intended for 18+ audiences. 

Features:

Mutiple Character Routes (3 started so far)

Mutiple CGs for every Route

20.000+ Words

Animated Cutscenes

The Love Interests:

You can play a older Version on Clould Novel, Updated Version will be uploaded to itch.io
